hooks.command: sh -c 'input=$(cat); cmd=$(echo "$input" | sed -n "s/.*\"command\":\"\([^\"]*\)\".*/\1/p"); case "$cmd" in *"dotnet build"*|*"dotnet test"*|*"dotnet format"*|*"npm run format"*|*"npm test"*|*"npm run build"*|*"npx playwright test"*) echo "❌ BLOCKED: Use MCP tools instead." >&2; echo "Command: $cmd" >&2; echo "" >&2; echo "Use these instead:" >&2; echo "• dotnet build → **build MCP tool**" >&2; echo "• dotnet test → **test MCP tool**" >&2; echo "• dotnet format → **format MCP tool**" >&2; echo "• npm run format → **format MCP tool**" >&2; echo "• npm test → **test MCP tool**" >&2; echo "• npm run build → **build MCP tool**" >&2; echo "• npx playwright test → **e2e MCP tool**" >&2; echo "" >&2; echo "Refer to .claude/rules/tools.md for details." >&2; exit 2 ;; *) exit 0 ;; esac'
